conversation.message: Hello, Nursery_E. We are very impressed with your program and location. As you are high on our list, we wanted to confirm what steps we should take regarding enrollment and your application timeline. We are keen to learn more.

Since this is Round 1, I want to reserve my formal application for my top choices (D or C) if possible, or for a later round when market clarity improves. I will use [TALK] to express strong interest and keep the conversation open without committing or risking an early rejection.
